response.overview: The tenth edition of Crypton Future Media's annual Magical Mirai series, this third-dimensional live concert event took place at INTEX Osaka in Suminoe, Osaka from August 12 to 14, 2022, Makuhari Messe International Exhibition Hall in Chiba, Tokyo from September 2 to 4, 2022, and SAPPORO CULTURAL ARTS THEATER hitaru in Hokkaido, Sapporo from February 4 to February 5, 2023. As its title suggests, the event, with the common theme of "retro-future", celebrates the tenth anniversary of the Magical Mirai series. The event's main key visual is illustrated by KEI, with costume designs by NOCO, and the official theme song of the event is a song entitled "FUTURE EVE" by sasakure.UK.
response.tagline: 初音ミク マジカルミライ 10th Anniversary
response.title: Hatsune Miku: Magical Mirai 10th Anniversary
